name: Seeker of the Eternal Emperor
source: Heroes of the High Court pg. 18
text: You lend some of your oracular powers to the leaders of Po Li in their search for the reborn Eternal Emperor, learning useful techniques to extend your divinations.
prerequisites: Enlarge Spell or Extend Spell, oracle’s curse class feature.
benefit: Treat your oracle level as 1 lower (minimum 1st level) when determining the effects of your oracle’s curse. You don’t require additional time to spontaneously cast divination spells modified by the Enlarge Spell or Extend Spell metamagic feats.
normal: Applying a metamagic feat to a spontaneously cast spell increases the casting time of the spell.
text_zh: 你将你的一些神谕能力借给渤骊的领袖，帮助他们寻找重生的永恒帝王（为了帝皇！），学习有用的技术来延展你的预示。
prerequisites_zh: 法术增远或法术延时，先知诅咒职业特性。
benefit_zh:
在确定你的先知诅咒的影响时视为你的先知等级低1级（最低为1级）。你不需要额外的时间来自发施放经由法术增远或法术延时专长超魔后的法术。

正常情况：应用超魔专长的自发法术增加法术的施法时间。
